skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cleaning robot
des:
Cleaning your floor has never been easier than it is now! 
The 3i robot allows you to clean your entire house without lifting a finger!
To get started, make sure you have an 3i account registered in the 3i App and your robot is connected and online. 
Then, you just need to enable the 3i skill by clicking on the "Enable" button. 
Once you're all set up, simply give your 3i robot a command and it'll take care of the rest.
Below are some of the voice commands you can use to control what your 3i robot does in your home. 
Your 3i robot will start or stop cleaning where you tell it to.
Alexa, ask cleaning robot to start cleaning. 
Alexa, ask cleaning robot to stop cleaning.
Alexa, ask cleaning robot to start charging.
